\Aura

\AuraView

Namespaces

Escaper
Exception
Helper

Classes

AbstractTemplate Provides an abstract TemplateView pattern implementation. We use an abstract so that the extended "real" Template class does not have access to the private support properties herein.
EscaperFactory A factory to create escaper objects.
Exception Aura View Exception
FormatTypes Provides a mapping between .format file extensions and their Content-Type values. Also handles negotiation between an array of Accept headers and a list of available .format views to be rendered.
HelperLocator A ServiceLocator implementation for loading and retaining helper objects.
Template Provides a concrete Template View pattern implementation; it does not have access to the private support properties of the parent abstract.
TemplateFinder Finds files in user-defined path hierarchies.
TwoStep Provides a TwoStepView pattern implementation; this allows for an inner ("core") view and and outer ("layout") view as commonly used by web apps.
